Title: Exempts certain security guards from annual in-service training courses
Summary: Exempts registered security guards with a bachelor's degree or higher from an accredited college or university in criminal justice or an equivalent from annual in service-training courses.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-n, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to exempting certain security guards from annual in-service training courses
